Detailed Description

Class SoundRefContainer implements a media container for sounds only.

UINT32 SoundRefContainer::GetSizeOfRecord (   )  const [protected, virtual]
 

Returns the size in bytes of one media reference record of the derived class. The size of the media reference records for different media references may differ.
